thread.title: A Man Trying To Smuggle Into Spain Was Found Stuffed Inside A Suitcase
thread.title_full: A Man Trying To Smuggle Into Spain Was Found Stuffed Inside A Suitcase - BuzzFeed News

author: Javier Moreno
title: A Man Trying To Smuggle Into Spain Was Found Stuffed Inside A Suitcase
text:
An official with the Guardia Civil in Ceuta told the AP that the woman raised suspicions when officials noticed her being evasive and showing signs of nervousness while carrying the luggage on a trolly. When they confronted her and opened the suitcase, they found a man curled up inside the poorly ventilated case and received immediate medical treatment.
ID: 10261279 3. A similar smuggling attempted occurred in Ceuta in 2015 when an 8-year-old boy from the Ivory Coast was discovered in a suitcase after it was scanned by border guards. View this image ›
Guardia Civil / EPA ID: 10261222 An estimated 1,100 migrants also tried to rush Ceuta’s border fence on Sunday, many of them apprehended and returned to Morocco, the BBC reported.
And on Monday, another woman was arrested after Spanish border police found two more migrants hidden in false compartments built into the car she was driving from Morocco.
